name: SNAKE
description: Snake Finance is a yield optimizer on Sonic, supporting Shadow Exchange and other dexs to leverage the x(3,3) flywheel. This is done through unique features of the protocol. The SNAKE token serves as the foundation of a growing ecosystem within the Sonic network. Its primary objective is to maintain a stable peg to S and expand the utility of the Sonic networkâ€™s native assets. Our mission is to build a dynamic protocol that evolves with market trends, staying ahead of the curve and continuously delivering value to our users through the Snake Finance protocool.
